reviews.text: Chris Hoddy and DFW Outdoor Lighting provided a great colored lighting solution and excellent service for our Home Owners Association.  Chris was very helpful analyzing our existing lighting system and implementing appropriate upgrades to meet our goals of a weather-proof infrastructure with future-proof attractive lighting.  Chris was also very helpful teaching us how to set up and program our system to maximize its value.  We are delighted with how the new colored lights have made our neighbor

DFW Outdoor Pros designed and installed our patio string lights and the uplighting of two large oak trees.  The results were excellent and price competitive. Chris' expertise, attention to detail, thoroughness, as well as his patience with our wishes was very much appreciated.  We highly recommend DFW Outdoor Lighting Pros, and will definitely use them again for our landscape lighting needs.
Jim W. - Coppell, TX

Chris with DFW Lighting did an excellent job adding some much needed up lighting at our Azalea Weddings venue. We love the affect & so do our guests. He really knows his business and was prompt & professional & reasonable . I would highly recommend DFW LIGHTING!
Martha w/Azalea Weddings in Fort Worth

DFW Outdoor Lighting Pros LLC upgraded my 20- year old landscape lighting to a low voltage system. Chris (owner) was knowledgable, professional, reliable, very polite, and a great communicator. He delivered what he promised and my wife and I are very happy with his work and the appearance of our landscape lighting. He charged a fair price for great service; a rare find these days. I highly recommend their services.

Chris with DFW Lighting Pros knocked our project out of the park. He was attentive to our needs and delivered with precision. He communicated well through the process and followed up after to make sure all was still well. I highly recommend them for any of your lighting needs.

Hey people if you want to add outdoor lights  to your home, DFW pro really does amazing job.  Because give nice ideas and design good. And do a quality work and are honest. We are happy when come home because beautiful effects on house flowers and plants.  We love it
Chris did a great job from start to finish on my outdoor lighting.  I highly recommend him!!!
Thank you for a terrific experience. Love the lighting and appreciate the excellent communication and customer service.
